formula: a(n) ~ (n-1)! * (-1)^(n+1) / r^n, where r = 1.306326940423079236174356658440682315179068358... is the root of the equation tan(r)/exp(r) = 1. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 24 2015
